ygData.subject: Reed's Bard Song Spreadsheet v. 1.05 Available.

ygData.messageBody:
For those who use it, I┬Ç┬á┬á'┬▓ve updated my spreadsheet. Here are the
changes:
- Added songs for level 39 and 45.
- Added modifications to Chant series.
- Converted Damage that was stored as PvP to nonPvP.
- Added Instrument Modifiers at the top of the printout (so
they┬Ç┬á┬á'┬▓re
on the printed page)

For those who don┬Ç┬á┬á'┬▓t know about it, it is an excel spreadsheet
that
will calculate the spell effects based upon your level and special
instruments, as well as indicate which songs/spells a given song
won┬Ç┬á┬á'┬▓t stack with, etc. Basically, it┬Ç┬á┬á'┬▓s a handy reference
sheet.

You can get it at Rokenn┬Ç┬á┬á'┬▓s Excellent Bard Song Analysis Site:

http://rgonzalez.net/EQSongs/

Enjoy!



- Reed Stormwind (E┬Ç┬á┬á'┬▓ci)
